name: Maya - the cat.
description:
"Maya - the cat" was developed during the "MindSet" game jam between 7th and 9th July 2017, Seoul, South Korea. With Korean, French and German participants. 

"Maya - the cat" team.
Programming: Ki-Heon Kim 
Art and Animations: Vanz Kim
Sound and Music:  Soo Jeong Bae + Linda Kruse
Game & Level Design: Linda Kruse + Soo Jeong Bae
